last_episode_to_air.name: The ending of the game
last_episode_to_air.overview: A potential new job offer keeps plaguing Lee Wan, so what will his final decision be?

name: Our Dating Sim
overview: Lee Wan and Shin Ki Tae were best friends in school, but Lee Wan harbored romantic feelings for Shin Ki Tae and confessed them, causing the two to part on unhappy terms. Seven years later, they're both navigating the job market, with Shin Ki Tae working as a programming ace at a gaming startup and Lee Wan pursuing his passion for illustration. When Shin Ki Tae's company starts looking for an illustrator for a new dating-themed game, Lee Wan applies for the job, raising the possibility of a second chance at romance.

episodes.name: Would you like to start the game?
episodes.overview: Lee Wan arrives at a video game company, and in the elevator it seems that he meets someone that he used to know.

episodes.name: Timing
episodes.overview: Lee Wan and Shin Ki Tae lost contact with each other after graduation, but the two of them still have feelings for the other.

episodes.name: Your Social Media
episodes.overview: Lee Wan shares his views with his colleagues during a meeting, but indirectly learns of a secret that Shin Ki Tae has been keeping from him.

episodes.name: A flying ball and sudden confession
episodes.overview: Shin Ki Tae accompanies Lee Wan back to their alma mater to collect research materials, and while they're on campus, he reveals to Lee Wan an object full of memories.

episodes.name: The Distance between Us
episodes.overview: When Shin Ki Tae sees Lee Wan working overtime, he decides to invite him over for a sleepover.

episodes.name: Promise to never be apart
episodes.overview: Shin Ki Tae and Lee Wan finally go out on their first date together!

episodes.name: Crossroads of choice
episodes.overview: Shin Ki tae accidentally heard Lee Wan reveal his secret, and because of this he feels deeply sad and concerned.

episodes.name: The ending of the game
episodes.overview: A potential new job offer keeps plaguing Lee Wan, so what will his final decision be?
